name: Silk Road, 2015
description: Drugs/The Capital, 2015. The art work is the result of intensive visits I paid in 2013 to the so-called darknet, the depths of the uncensored and anonymous Internet. I procured access to the networks where illegal goods are traded. A virtual space is shown that has developed beyond what the law permits and thus creates a parallel world, in which different power arrangements apply. A printed version was shown in different museums and art fairs around the world since 2015.
